quotes.quote: The worst moment for the atheist is when he is really thankful and has nobody to thank.
quotes.author: Dante Gabriel Rossetti

quotes.quote: I always admired atheists. I think it takes a lot of faith.
quotes.author: Diane Frolov and Andrew Schneider

quotes.quote: The opposite of the religious fanatic is not the fanatical atheist but the gentle cynic who cares not whether there is a god or not.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: I believe in God, only I spell it Nature.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: If there were no God, there would be no Atheists.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: I have too much respect for the idea of God to make it responsible for such an absurd world.
quotes.author: Georges Duhamel

quotes.quote: I'm a born-again atheist.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: I once wanted to become an atheist, but I gave up - they have no holidays.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: Nobody talks so constantly about God as those who insist that there is no God.
quotes.author: Heywood Broun

quotes.quote: An atheist is a man who has no invisible means of support.
quotes.author: John Buchan

quotes.quote: I don't know if God exists, but it would be better for His reputation if He didn't.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: I’m the world’s least happy atheist. I miss having religious faith, but trying to have it seems like trying to be in love with someone that you’re not in love with.
quotes.author: Lisa Williams

quotes.quote: I am an atheist, myself. A simple faith, but a great comfort to me, in these last days.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: I'm still an atheist, thank God.
quotes.author: Luis Bunuel

quotes.quote: It is the final proof of God's omnipotence that he need not exist in order to save us.
quotes.author: Peter De Vries

quotes.quote: When I told the people of Northern Ireland that I was an atheist, a woman in the audience stood up and said, "Yes, but is it the God of the Catholics or the God of the Protestants in whom you don't believe?"
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: Religion is about turning untested belief into unshakeable truth through the power of institutions and the passage of time.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: We are all atheists about most of the gods that societies have ever believed in. Some of us just go one god further.
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: You've got your phenomenon on one hand. Concrete and knowable. On the other hand you've got the incomprehensible. You call it God, but to me, God or no, it remains just that, the unknowable.
quotes.author: Robin Green and Mitchell Burgess

quotes.quote: Ask a deeply religious Christian if he'd rather live next to a bearded Muslim that may or may not be plotting a terror attack, or an atheist that may or may not show him how to set up a wireless network in his house. On the scale of prejudice, atheists don't seem so bad lately.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Shake off all the fears of servile prejudices, under which weak minds are servilely crouched. Fix reason firmly in her seat, and call on her tribunal for every fact, every opinion. Question with boldness even the existence of a God; because, if there be one, he must more approve of the homage of reason than that of blindfolded fear.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: If God did not exist, it would be necessary to invent him.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: How can I believe in God when just last week I got my tongue caught in the roller of an electric typewriter?
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: If it turns out that there is a God, I don't think that he's evil. But the worst that you can say about him is that basically he's an underachiever.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: To you I'm an atheist; to God, I'm the Loyal Opposition.
quotes.author: Woody Allen
